Name: Mar√≠a Elena
description:
Maria is married. Her husband is engaged in farming and raising chickens.

Maria works at a food stall in the morning. In the afternoon, she looks after chickens and sells them at the market. Her husband helps her raise the animals.

Maria needs a loan in order to purchase more chickens, as well as feed and vaccines for their healthy development, in order to sell them.

Maria dreams of increasing her batch of chickens, generating higher earnings and offering her family a higher quality of life.
